name: Seafood Casserola
description: Fresh flounder, shrimp, sea scallops, and crab meat.

name: Sweet & Sour Fish Fillet
description: Fish cooked in pineapple juice, soy sauce, brown sugar , tilapia fillets.

name: Hunan Shrimp
description: A hot and spicy shrimp dish packed with flavor from chili bean paste, garlic, soy sauce, and rice vinegar.

name: Szechuan Shrimp
description: Prawns with dry red chillies, peppercorns and other vegetables alongside the meat.

name: General Tso's Shrimp
description: Chicken served with rice vinegar, soy sauce, hoisin sauce, water, sugar, and some corn starch to thicken the sauce.

name: Scallops w. Mixed Vegetables
description: Scallops cooked with carrot, red bell pepper , garlic and other vegetables.

name: Scallops w. Black Bean Sauce
description: Scallops cooked with black beans , garlic, ginger, soy and oysters sauce.

name: Scallops w. Hot Garlic Sauce
description: Scallops cooked with unsalted butter and minced garlic cloves.

name: Kung Pao Squid
description: Squid stir fried served with sauce made from hot dried Chile Peppers, onions, garlic and salt.
